Package org.moddingx.libx.base.tile

Class MenuBlockBE<T extends net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity,C extends BlockEntityMenu<T>>

java.lang.Object
net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockBehaviour
net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block
org.moddingx.libx.base.BlockBase
org.moddingx.libx.base.tile.BlockBE<T>
org.moddingx.libx.base.tile.MenuBlockBE<T,C>
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.minecraft.world.flag.FeatureElement, net.minecraft.world.level.block.EntityBlock, net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeBlock, Registerable
public class MenuBlockBE<T extends net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity,C extends BlockEntityMenu<T>> extends BlockBE<T>
This class registers a menu to its block entity type and handles the gui opening when the block is right clicked. You still need to manually register the screen on the client

Note: You need to register the Screen by yourself using the MenuScreens register function.

See Also:
  • BlockEntityMenu
